title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama CLI tool that lets you run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally with a single command-line interface.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for Ollama; provides a simple API to chat, generate embeddings, pull models, list running models, etc.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node and browsers via fetch, supports streaming completions.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama; exposes chat, completion and embedding interfaces to use local models in LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source web UI for Ollama (formerly Ollama-WebUI); chat interface, model management, multi-user support, Docker image.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; supports generate, chat, embeddings, model pulling, and streaming responses.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem for Ollama; simple wrapper for generate, chat, embeddings and model management endpoints.

title: ollamajs
summary: Lightweight npm package providing TypeScript-friendly Ollama client with async/await and streaming support.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images and compose files for running Ollama server and web-ui in containers with GPU/CPU support.

title: ollama-cli-chat
summary: Interactive REPL wrapper around the ollama CLI that adds persistent chat history and markdown rendering in the terminal.

title: ollama-hass-addon
summary: Home Assistant add-on that runs Ollama server locally on your HassIO instance so you can expose LLMs to automations.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings Ollama-powered code completion and inline chat using local models.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat app template that connects to local Ollama server; shows how to build quick web demos with session state.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with configurable models, PVC and GPU node-selector.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Next.js chatbot UI that works with Ollama backend; features markdown, code highlighting, and responsive layout.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async client for Ollama; supports generate, chat, embeddings and model ops.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim client for Ollama; exposes generate, chat, list, pull and streaming endpoints with idiomatic Nim syntax.
